name: pnp-list-formatting-out-of-office
title: Out of Office
shortDescription: This sample shows how to format a list to show upcoming employee time away from office.
longDescription: This sample shows how to format a list to show upcoming employee time away from office.

metadata.value: ms-bgColor-themeLighterAlt, ms-fontColor-themeLighter, ms-fontColor-neutralPrimary, ms-fontColor-neutralSecondary, ms-fontWeight-regular, ms-fontWeight-semibold, ms-fontSize-l, ms-fontSize-m, ms-fontSize-s

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
